properties.areaDesc: Floyd, IN; Hardin, KY; Jefferson, KY; Clark, IN; Harrison, IN; Meade, KY
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 14 at 11:33PM EST until February 19 at 12:08PM EST by NWS Louisville KY
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in
Kentucky...

Kentucky River at Lockport Lock
Rolling Fork River near Boston

affecting the following counties in Kentucky...Carroll...Hardin...
Henry...Nelson...Owen.

...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana...
Kentucky...

Ohio River at McAlpine Upper
Ohio River at McAlpine Lower
Ohio River at Cannelton Lock
Ohio River at Tell City
Green River at Woodbury
Green River at Rochester

affecting the following counties in Indiana...Clark...Crawford...
Floyd...Harrison...Perry and in Kentucky...Breckinridge...Butler...
Hancock...Hardin...Jefferson...Meade...Muhlenberg...Ohio...Oldham...
Warren.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Ohio River at McAlpine Lower.
* until Wednesday afternoon.
* At 11:00 PM Friday the stage was 54.9 feet.
* Flood stage is 55.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by tonight and continue to rise
to near 57.6 feet by early Monday morning. The river will fall
below flood stage by Wednesday morning.
* Impact...At 58.0 feet...IN 111 floods upstream of Bridgeport.
* Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 57.6
feet on Mar 21 2008.
properties.instruction:
If you are affected by these crests take any necessary actions.
Additional information is available at
water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lmk.
